page.title: 10LEO'S SUPERSTORE
page.content: Leo's Superstore is one of the largest supermarkets in the Filton area, and so it attracts customers from many of the housing estates in the locality. 16,000 customers use Leo's during the week, with Thursday, Friday and Saturday being the busiest days. Opening hours are 9a.m. to 8p.m. Monday to Friday, 9a.m. to 5p.m. Saturday. The store has an area of 23,000 square feet most of which is retail area-less than 25% being for storage or offices. On average there is Â£200,000 worth of goods in the store, the most expensive item being a bottle of brandy. General groceries account for almost 80% of the sales , with meat sales being about 10%, and non food items accounting for 10%. Leo's employ 150 staff. There are 18 cash tills. Shoplifting is a problem.
